anya-e1214n0:6_0: Chanda’hānitthamo’kāraṁ-dhātvantānaṁ siyākva ci, yūnaṁ dīgho ca dhātumhā-pubbama’tthapadaṁ api.
anya-e1214n0:8_0: Bhū sattāyaṁ paca pāke gamusappa gatimhi (ca);
anya-e1214n0:12_0: Ku sadde kucchite ṭaṅka dhāraṇe maki maṇḍane.
anya-e1214n0:16_1: Vava, lokanavittisu cakkhavutimhi (tu) rukkha (ca) khe thirahiṁsakhaṇe niya, mo’panayiṭṭhi vatādisa muṇḍisu dikkha (’tha) kakkha-kakhā hasane tura, hiṁsanavuddhigatīsu (hi) dakkha’danamhi (tu) jakkha (ca) bhakkha (matā) ana, jāladukhesu (tu) dikkha (ca) dukkha (ca) ikkha disa’ṅka na ko’kha suse.
anya-e1214n0:17_1: [A] nikkha cumbane’(pi) sikkha vijju’pādu’ pāsānamhi rakkha guttivāraṇe (pi) uñchane (siyā’pi) bhikkha yāvaladdhya’laddhisū (pi) vakkha rosasaṁhatesu mokkha muttiyaṁ caje (pi) cikkha vācabodhanesu.
anya-e1214n0:18_0: [Ba] nakha makha rakha naṅkhāmaṅkharakkhī’khīlaṅkhā lakha vakha ikha iṅkhā uṅkha vaṅkhū’kha gatyaṁ vakhi makhi kakhi kaṅkhe khī khaye ukkha seke khu khutadhanisu (vutto) khe(’tha) khāde supe (ca.)
anya-e1214n0:21_0: Agī igī rigī ligī vagī gatya’tthadhātavo.
anya-e1214n0:23_0: Silāgha katthane jaggha hasane aggha agghane;
anya-e1214n0:26_0: Vaca byattavace yāca yācane ruca dittiyaṁ;
anya-e1214n0:27_0: Suca soke kuca sadde (atho) vica vivecane.
anya-e1214n0:33_0: Paca yāte kaci-vacca dittiyaṁ maci dhāraṇe.
anya-e1214n0:35_0: Puccha sampucchane muccha mohasmiṁ lañcha lakkhaṇe;
anya-e1214n0:38_0: Taccho tanukiraye piñcha piñchane rāja dittiyaṁ;
anya-e1214n0:42_0: Bhaja saṁsevane sañja saṅge (tu) iñja kampane.
anya-e1214n0:48_0: Majja saṁsuddhiyaṁ lajja lajjane tajja tajjane.
anya-e1214n0:51_0: Guja-kuja dvayaṁ sadde akhyatte khajja bhakkhaṇe.
anya-e1214n0:53_0: Bhajja pāke viji bhayacalane vīja vījane;
anya-e1214n0:54_0: Khajī gamanavekalle jī jaye ju jave (siyā;).
anya-e1214n0:56_0: Jhe cintāyujjha ussagge gamane aṭa-paṭa dvayaṁ;
anya-e1214n0:57_0: Naṭa nacce raṭa paribhāsane vaṭa veṭhane.
anya-e1214n0:59_0: Vaṭṭa āvattane vaṇṭa vaṇṭatthe kaṭa maddane;
anya-e1214n0:66_0: Ghaṭi saṅghaṭṭane taṭṭa cchedane muṭa maddane.
anya-e1214n0:68_0: Paṭha byattavace heṭha bādhāyaṁ veṭha veṭhane;
anya-e1214n0:75_0: Maṇḍa vibhūsane caṇḍa caṇḍikke bhaḍi bhaṅḍane.
anya-e1214n0:81_0: Kuḍi dāhe paḍi gate hiḍi āhiṇḍane (siyā;);
anya-e1214n0:87_0: Vaḍḍha saṁvaḍḍhane kaḍḍha kaḍḍhaṇe bhaṇa bhāsane;
anya-e1214n0:89_0: Soṇa vaṇṇe guṇa’bhyāse iṇa-pheṇa dvayaṁ gate,
anya-e1214n0:101_0: Gotthu vaṁse patha-pantha gate nanda samiddhiyaṁ;
anya-e1214n0:113_0: Madi balye muda-madā santose madda maddane;
anya-e1214n0:116_0: Vida lābhe dada dāne rudi assuvimocane;
anya-e1214n0:127_0: Dā dave du gatīvuddhayaṁ dā dāne vida jānane,
anya-e1214n0:128_0: Tadi ālasiye bādha bādhāyaṁ gudha kīḷane;
anya-e1214n0:133_0: Sidhu gatimhi yudha sampahāre vidha vedhane,
anya-e1214n0:136_0: Sidha-sādha (ca) siddhimhi dhe pāne indha dittiyaṁ,
anya-e1214n0:137_0: Māna pūjāya vana-sana sambhave ana pāṇane;
anya-e1214n0:140_0: Gupa gopanake gupa saṁvaraṇe tapa santāpe tapa issariye,
anya-e1214n0:141_0: Cupa mandagate tapuubbege rapa-lapa vākye sapa akkose;
anya-e1214n0:144_0: Kapi kiñcicale kappa sāmatthe vepu kampane;
anya-e1214n0:149_0: Capa sāntve pu pavane jhapa dāhe supo saye,
anya-e1214n0:153_0: Amba sadde (ca) assāde tāyane sabi maṇḍane;
anya-e1214n0:158_0: Labha lābhe jambha gattavināme subha sobhane,
anya-e1214n0:159_0: Bhī bhaye rabha rābhasse (cā)’rambhe khubha sañcale;
anya-e1214n0:162_0: Sumbha saṁsumbhane sambha vissāse yabha methune;
anya-e1214n0:170_0: Damo dame nama name (atho) sama parissame,
anya-e1214n0:171_0: Yamu uparame nāse ama yāte mu bandhane;
anya-e1214n0:178_0: Cāya sampūjane tāya santāne pāya vuddhiyaṁ,
anya-e1214n0:181_0: Tara taraṇasmiṁ thara santharaṇe bhara bharaṇasmiṁ phara sampharaṇe,
anya-e1214n0:182_0: Sara gati cintā hiṁsā sadde phura calanādo hara haraṇasmiṁ;
anya-e1214n0:184_0: Ri santatismiṁ ri gate ru sadde khuracchidasmiṁ dhara dhāraṇamhi,
anya-e1214n0:185_0: Jara jīraṇatthe marapāṇacāge khara sekanāse ghara sevanamhi;
anya-e1214n0:187_0: Garo nigareṇa seke dara ḍāhe vidāraṇe,
anya-e1214n0:191_0: Kura kkose nara naye jāgara supinakkhaye;
anya-e1214n0:194_0: Khala sañcalane phulla vikāse jala dittiyaṁ;
anya-e1214n0:197_0: Dala duggatiyaṁ nīla vaṇṇe mīla nimīlane;
anya-e1214n0:212_0: Ava rakkhaṇe jīva pāṇadhāraṇe (tu) plavo gate;
anya-e1214n0:215_0: Davo (tu) davane devu devane sevu sevane;
anya-e1214n0:219_0: Hve avhāne keva seke dhuva yātrā thiresu (ca;);
anya-e1214n0:221_0: Asa gasa adane ghasa adanasmiṁ-isa pariyese isuicchāyaṁ,
anya-e1214n0:224_0: Kusa akkose dusa appīte-tusa santose pusa posamhi,
anya-e1214n0:225_0: Rusa ālepe rusa hiṁsāyaṁ-masu macchere usu dāhe (’pi;)
anya-e1214n0:227_0: Hasa hasanasmiṁ ghusa saddasmiṁ-tasa ubbege trasa ubbege,
anya-e1214n0:230_0: Gavesa maggaṇe paṁsa nāsane disa pekkhaṇe,
anya-e1214n0:233_0: Saṁsa pasaṁsane issa issāyaṁ kassa kassane,
anya-e1214n0:234_0: Dhaṁsa padhaṁsane siṁsa icchāyaṁ ghaṁsa ghaṁsane;
anya-e1214n0:240_0: Kisa sāṇe kasa gate kasa hiṁsāvilekhane;
anya-e1214n0:246_0: Su sadde su pasavane si saye (ca) si sevane;
anya-e1214n0:249_0: Raha cāgasmiṁ muha mucchāyaṁ-maha sattāyaṁ bahu saṁkhyāne;
anya-e1214n0:252_0: Ruha sañjanane ūha vitakke vaha pāpaṇe;
anya-e1214n0:255_0: Nindāyaṁ garaho īha ghaṭṭane miha sevane;
anya-e1214n0:258_0: Vhe saddamhi hasane hā cāge luḷa manthane
